Posts.Content: I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF ANYONE HAVING HAD A LUMPECTOMY IS USING A BREAST PROSTHESIS? I HAVE BEEN PUTTING OFF GETTING ONE FOR 2 YEARS BECAUSE OF THE MONEY. I HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT IT WOULD MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE IN HOW I LOOKED AND FELT ABOUT MYSELF. I WOULD LIKE ANY ADVICE YOU CAN GIVE ME ABOUT THIS. THANKS
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: PROSTHESIS

Posts.Content: I AM GOING NEXT WEEK TO SEE ABOUT GETTING THE PROSTHESIS. MY HUSBAND SAID FORGET THE INSURANCE. SAID I WOULD HAVE HAD ONE LONG AGO IF I HAD JUST SAID SOMETHING ABOUT WANTING ONE.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: PROSTHESIS

Posts.Content: MY INSURANCE WOULD COVER IT IF THERE WAS A NETWORK PROVIDER ANYWHERE NEAR ME. THERE IS NOT ONE SO I WOULD HAVE TO PAY A $300.00 DEDUCTIBLE AND THEN 50% OF THE REST. SO YOU MIGHT AS WELL SAY THEY DO NOT COVER IT AT ALL. I WILL GO ON MEDICARE IN 2 MONTHS AND I DID FIND OUT THIS EVENIG THAT THEY WILL COVER IT. I GUESS I WILL JUST WAIT UNTIL I GO ON THE MEDICARE TO GET THIS.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: PROSTHESIS

Posts.Content: MY CANCER DOCTORS DID MENTION LYMPHODEMA TO ME JUST A BIT. I MUST SAY THAT NOW 2 YEARS AFTER MY LUMPECTOMY I DO HAVE MILD LYMPHODEMA. THE ONE THAT DID TELL ME ABOUT IT WAS MY PRIMARY CARE DOCTORS NURSE. I HAD GONE THERE BECAUSE OF ANOTHER HEALTH PROBLEM AND WHEN SHE STARTED TO TAKE MY BLOOD PRESSURE I PUT OUT THE ARM ON THE SIDE OF THE LUMPECTOMY. BEING A GOOD NURSE SHE REMEMBER ABOUT MY LUMPECTOMY AND SAID TO ME ISN'T THAT THE SIDE OF YOUR LUMPECTOMY. WHEN I SAID YES SHE WENT ON TO EXPLAIN LYMPHODEMA TO ME AND TOLD ME RIGHT THEN TO GO AND GET A MEDICAL ALERT BRACELET AND WEAR IT ALL THE TIME. JUST A FEW MONTHS BEFORE THIS I HAD GONE IN TO HAVE A COLONOSCOPY DONE AND THEY HAD USE THE LUMPECTOMY SIDE TO PUT IN THE IV. MAYBE THAT IS WHY I HAVE THE LYMPHODEMA NOW. I WILL NEVER KNOW FOR SURE IF THAT CAUSED IT OR IF I WOULD HAVE GOTTEN IT ANYWAY. SO THANKS TO A GOOD NURSE I NOW HAVE THE BRACELET AND NEVER COMES OFF. IT HAS ALL THE INFORMATION ON IT ABOUT NO IV'S, BLOOD PRESSURE ETC. SO I WOULD TELL EVERYONE TO GET A MEDICAL ALERT BRACELET IT YOU DO NOT HAVE ONE. THEY DO NOT COST THAT MUCH UNLESS YOU WANT A GOLD ONE.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY

Posts.Title: Lymphedema awareness

Posts.Content: I HAD A LUMPECTOMY IN OCT 2002 ALONG WITH 37 RADIATION TREATMENTS. I HAD 7 LYMPH GLAND REMOVE, ALL CLEAR. FOR NOW I AM TAKING ARIMIDEX AND GAINING LOTS OF WEIGHT. MY PC DOCTOR TELLS ME ARIMIDEX WILL CAUSE WEIGHT GAIN. I AM DOING GOOD FOR NOW. I DO WORRY SOME ABOUT IT COMING BACK. I FIND IT HELPS TO TALK WITH OTHERS ALSO HAVING TO DEAL WITH THIS. MY HUSBAND AND SONS ARE GREAT, BUT THEY CAN NOT REALLY UNDERSTAND JUST HOW I FEEL INSIDE. I HAVE BEEN USING ANOTHER MESSAGE BOARD ON THE LIVING BEYOND BREAST CANCER SITE. THAT IS HOW I LEARNED ABOUT THIS ONE. THIS ON SEEMS HARDER TO USE THAT THE OTHER ONE SO PLEASE PUT UP WITH ME UNTIL I LEARN MORE ABOUT HOW THIS ONE WORKS. I JUST FOUND OUT ON MY LAST CHECK UP WITH THE RADIOLOGIST THIS PAST WEEK THAT I HAVE LYMPHODEMA IN MY ARM NOW. JUST A MILD CASE AT THIS TIME. I AM HOPING IT DOES NOT GET WORSE. I DO NOT KNOW MUCH ABOUT LYMPHODEMA BUT I THINK I NEED TO LEARN AS MUCH AS I CAN ABOUT IT. I AM GLAD THAT I FOUND THIS SITE AND LOOK FORWARD TO COMING HERE VERY OFTEN.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: NEW TO THIS SIE

Posts.Content: HELLO, I AM NEW TO THIS SITE AND NOT SURE HOW TO EVEN USE IT. I HAVE BREAST CANCER AND WAS LOOKING FOR SUPPORT AND SOMEONE TO SHARE WITH. I HEARD ABOUT THIS SITE FROM SOMEONE ON ANOTHER MESSAGE BOARD, THIS SAID THIS WAS A GOOD ONE ALSO.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: NEW TO THIS SIE

Posts.Content: HI, YES MINE WAS FOUND EARLY. I WAS VERY LUCKY IN THAT. AS FOR THE LYMPHODEMA IT BOTHERS ME IF I USE THE ARM MUCH. WHEN I STARTS I DO STOP WHAT I AM DOING AND GET THE ARM UP AND REALLY BABY IT UNTIL ALL SWELLING HAS GONE AWAY. THEN WHEN I OVER DO IT AGAIN THE SWELLING COMES BACK AGAIN. MY SURGERY WAS ON THE RIGHT SIDE AND I AM RIGHT HAND. MY LEFT HAD IS USLESS AS FAR AS DOING MUCH WITH IT. NO CORDINATION AT ALL. SO I USE MY RIGHT ARM FOR MOST THINGS. I AM TRYING HARD TO MAKE MYSELF START DOING MORE WITH THE LEFT ARM.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: NEW TO THIS SIE

Posts.Content: HI, MY MOTHER HAD THAT PROBLEM WITH HER CHEMO FOR BC. SHE HAD GONE TO HER DENTIST BECAUSE SHE KNEW SHE WAS HAVING A PROBLEM. HE TOLD HER THAT WENT ALONG WITH THE CHEMO AND TOLD HER TO NOT WASTE HER MONEY GETTING TEETH TAKEN CARE OF UNTIL SOME TIME PAST AFTER FINISHING THE CHEMO. TO LET THE DECAYING SLOW DOWN SOME FIRST. THAT IS WHAT SHE DID AND WAS THANKFUL THAT HER DENTIST DID NOT TAKE ADVANTAGE OF HER BY DOING ALOT OF DENTIAL WORK THAT WOULD MOST LIKELY HAVE TO BE DONE OVER AGAIN. I HOPE THIS HELPS YOU WITH THE ANSWER THAT YOU NEED.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY

Posts.Title: Accelerated tooth decay post chemo?

Posts.Content: HI I ALSO HAVE SCAR TISSUE AT THE SITE OF SURGERY. I HAVE HAD ALL MY DOCTORS TELL ME THAT IS WHAT IT IS. I HAVE HAD MAMO SINCE AND NOTHING SHOWS AS FAR AS A NEW TUMOR. I HAVE THE SAME KIND OF SCAR TISSUE WHERE MY HYSTERTOMY SCAR IS. I THINK SOME OR MORE PRONE TO DEVELOP THIS KIND OF SCAR TISSUE THAT OTHERS. AS FOR ME I AM VERY FAIR SKINNED AND WAS TOLD THAT IS ONE THING THAT MAKES ME MORE PRONE TO HAVE THIS KIND OF THING HAPPEN. I WILL SAY THIS, DO NOT STOP ASKING QUESTIONS ABOUT IT UNITL YOU ARE COMFORTABLE WITH THE ANSWER.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: For Dr Lu - cording in breast after rx

Posts.Content: I WAS WATCHING THE PBS CHANNEL ON THE TV. THEY HAD A MAN ON BY THE NAME OF GARY NULL. HE CAMES TO KNOW A GROUP OF VITIAMS AND HERBS THAT WILL GROW HAIR. SAYS THAT TAKES THESE YOU HAIR WILL GROW 9 INCHES IN 6 MONTHS. HE ALSO SAID THAT IF YOU WERE BALD IT WAS MAKE YOUR HAIR COME BACK EVEN IF YOU HEAD WAS AS BALD AS AN EGG. HE SALES BOOKS ON VIT. AND HERBS AND GIVES TALKS ON THEM WHICH COST ALOT TO GO TO. I AM GOING TO SEE HIM AN E-MAIL TELLING HOW GREAT IT WOULD BE IF HE WOULD SHARE THIS WONDERFUL INFORMATION WITH ALL CANCER DOCTORS SO THAT THEY COULD PASS IT ON TO ALL THE PEOPLE THEY TREAT WHO LOSE THEIR HAIR. I THINK WE SHOULD ALL SEND HIM ONE ABOUT IT.
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: HAIR HAIR HAIR

Posts.Content: HI, I HAVE BEEN ON ARIMIDEX FOR 2 YEARS NOW. I WAS NEVER ON TAMO. SINCE I TAKE BLOOD THINNERS I COULD NOT TAKE THAT ONE. WHAT I HAD SEEN ON THE NEWS WAS THAT THE ARIMIDEX HAD PROVED TO WORK BETTER IN OLDER WOMEN BUT STILL NOT ENOUGH STUDY TO KNOW ABOUT HOW IS WAS ON YOUNGER WOMEN. SINCE I AM 60 I GUESS I FALL INTO THE OLDER GROUP. MY DOCTOR HAS SAID I WOULD BE ON THIS FOR 5 YEARS. WHAT THEN
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: 5 year study complete......Tamoxefin vs. Arimidex

Posts.Content: HI, I HAD 37 RADIATION TREATMENTS FOR BREAST CANCER. I WAS TOLD TO USE THE LOTION ALSO. I STARTED TO GET A RASH SOMETHING LIKE WHAT YOU SEEM TO HAVE TO SOONER IN MY TREATMETN. I STOPPED USING ANY KIND OF LOTIONS OR CREAMS. JUST KEPT MYSELF CLEAN WITHOUT RUBBING HARD OVER THE BREAST. WITH A COUPLE DAYS OF STOPPING THE LOTION THE RASH WAS GONE AND DID NOT COME BACK. OTHERS THAT I TALKED TO DURING TREATMENTS WE USING THE LOTIONS AND HAVING LOT OF PROBLEMS WITH A RASH. I MUST SAY I NEVER TOLD THEM AT TREATMENT THAT I WAS NO LONGER USING THE LOTION. THEY DID MENTION TO ME HOW WELL MY SINK WAS DOING WITH NO RASH. THEY WERE REALLY SUPPRISE ABOUT THIS SINCE A AM A NATUREAL REDHEAD WITH VERY FAIR SKIN. THEY HAD EXPECTED MY SKIN TO BURN BAD DURING TREATMENT. I DID NOT HAVE ANY BURNING FROM THE RADIATION EITHER. I AM NOT TELLING YOU TO STOP USING THE LOTION. THAT IS A PERSONEL THING YOU MUST DECIDE FOR YOURSELF. BEST OF LUCK
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: Radiation Rash

Posts.Content: HI I DO NOT KNOW IF THE ARIMIDEX WILL MAKE YOUR CHOLESTEROL GO UP OR NOT. I ONLY KNOW THAT MINE HAS SINCE BEING ON ARIMIDEX. I HAVE ALSO PUT ON ABOUT 45 POUNDS WHICH CAN EFFECT THE CHOLESTEROL I BELIEVE. THE ZOCOR DID NOTHING FOR ME EXCEPT SEND MY BLOOD PRESSURE SKY HIGH. ZITA IS WORKING GOOD FOR ME NOW. DID YOU PUT ON WEIGHT WITH THE ARIMIDEX ALSO??
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: Question

Posts.Content: I ALSO THINK IT IS VERY IMPORTANT THAT YOU MAKE SURE WHAT IS GOING ON. GET A BIOPSY SO YOU KNOW FOR SURE AND CAN REST EASY IF IT IS NOTHING BUT MORE IMPORTANT SO THAT YOU CAN TAKE CARE OF IT EARLY IF THERE IS A PROBLEM. I WILL NEVER TAKE A CHANCE WITH SOMETHING LIKE THAT, IF ONE DOCTOR WILL NOT DO A BIOPSY WHEN SOMETHING SHOWS UP I WILL KEEP GOING TO DIFFERENT DOCTORS UNTIL I FIND ONE THAT WILL BEST OF LUCK
Posts.Signature: HAVE A WONDERFUL AND SAFE DAY
Posts.Title: Can you help?
